text:
From 'u up?' to cock-up: all the Oscars highlights – in pictures   View more sharing options   Close 
A selection of the best pictures from the 89th Academy Awards in Los Angeles
Matt Fidler 
Monday 27 February 2017 06.03 GMT 

Actor Ryan Gosling arrives for the ceremony Photograph: Ben Peterson/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Denzel Washington shakes hands with a fan Photograph: Powers Imagery/Invision/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Actor Ruth Negga faces the photographer pen on the red carpet Photograph: Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

This is the 89th Academy Awards Photograph: Lucy Nicholson/Reuters
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Meryl Streep reacts to spontaneous applause from the audience as she takes her seat Photograph: Lucy Nicholson/Reuters
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Justin Timberlake kicks off the show with a medley where he danced amongst the crowd Photograph: Mark Ralston/AFP/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Nasa mathematician Katherine Johnson, whose story is told in Hidden Figures, appears onstage Photograph: Kevin Winter/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Alicia Vikander presents the award for best actor in a supporting role to Mahershala Ali for his performance in the best picture, Moonlight Photograph: Matt Sayles/Invision/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Candy is delivered from the rafters to the audience in balloons Photograph: Lucy Nicholson/Reuters
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Janelle Monae, Taraji P Henson, and Octavia Spencer present the award for best documentary feature Photograph: Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Sting performs best original song nominee The Empty Chair Photograph: Lucy Nicholson/Reuters
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Viola Davis accepts the best supporting actress award for her performance in Fences Photograph: Kevin Winter/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Anousheh Ansari accepts the award for best foreign language film for The Salesman on behalf of Asghar Farhadi, who stayed away from the ceremny in protest at President Trump’s executive order banning travel to the US from seven Muslim-majority countries Photograph: Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Vicky and Gary from Chicago, among other surprised members of the public, who were subsequently ‘married’ by Denzel Washington during a Jimmy Kimmel skit Photograph: Lucy Nicholson/Reuters
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Michael J Fox and Seth Rogen onstage with a DeLorean Photograph: Kevin Winter/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Jimmy Kimmel tweets President Donald Trump on stage at the Oscars Photograph: Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Producer Joanna Natasegara and director Orlando von Einsiedel accept the best documentary short subject Oscar for The White Helmets. Cinematographer Khaled Khatib was denied entry to the US after Department of Homeland Security officials said they had discovered ‘derogatory information’ about him Photograph: Kevin Winter/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

US singer John Legend performs songs from the film La La Land Photograph: Mark Ralston/AFP/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Justin Hurwitz wins best original score for La La Land Photograph: Lucy Nicholson/Reuters
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Singer Sara Bareilles performs onstage during the In Memoriam segment devoted to those in the industry who died this year Photograph: Kevin Winter/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Emma Stone backstage Photograph: Christopher Polk/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Damien Chazelle is congratulated for winning best director Photograph: Lucy Nicholson/Reuters
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Casey Affleck, winner for best actor for Manchester by the Sea, is embraced by his brother Ben on stage Photograph: Mark Ralston/AFP/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Emma Stone delivers her acceptance speech after winning the best actress award for La La Land Photograph: Mark Ralston/AFP/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Producer Fred Berger and the cast of La La Land mistakenly accept the award for best picture at the Oscars, while confusion over envelopes continues behind them Photograph: Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

Warren Beatty shows the card reading ‘Best Film: Moonlight’, after La La Land was mistakenly read out Photograph: Mark Ralston/AFP/Getty Images
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 

The cast of Moonlight, after winning the Oscar for best picture Photograph: Lucy Nicholson/Reuters
Facebook Twitter Pinterest 
Oscars 2017 Oscars Awards and prizes
